title: Blended Instructional Design for Enhancing Interprofessional Competencies in Emergency Medicine

context.prior_knowledge: Possession of basic domain expertise in medical/legal/technical fields
context.additional_context: Emphasizing emergency response team capabilities during the COVID-19 pandemic

learning_goals: Learners achieve at least 85% of TeamSTEPPS core competencies through simulation-based team activities.
Based on medical film analysis and MOOC learning, learners can propose three or more interprofessional collaboration strategies for emergency situations.
Through VR simulations and team debriefings, learners improve the accuracy of patient safety-related decision-making by 40%.
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
